TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IRunningObjectTable

summary.span: 提供 接口的托管定义。

span.span: Provides the managed definition of the interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以通过调用 COM 中检索到正在运行对象表接口[GetRunningObjectTable](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=163472)函数。You can retrieve an interface to the running object table by calling the COM [GetRunningObjectTable](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=163472) function. 有关详细信息，请参阅 COM 的文档[IRunningObjectTable](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=163473) MSDN 库中的接口。For more information, see the documentation for the COM [IRunningObjectTable](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=163473) interface in the MSDN library. 本机代码中的 COM 方法将返回的 HRESULT 时，公共语言运行时将引发异常。The common language runtime throws an exception when a COM method in native code returns an HRESULT. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 映射 Hresult 和异常](~/docs/framework/interop/how-to-map-hresults-and-exceptions.md)。For more information, see [How to: Map HRESULTs and Exceptions](~/docs/framework/interop/how-to-map-hresults-and-exceptions.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public void EnumRunning (out System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IEnumMoniker ppenumMoniker);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void EnumRunning([out] class System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IEnumMoniker& ppenumMoniker) cil managed
Public Sub EnumRunning (ByRef ppenumMoniker As IEnumMoniker)
public: void EnumRunning([Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::Runtime::InteropServices::ComTypes::IEnumMoniker ^ % ppenumMoniker);

param.name: ppenumMoniker
param.span: 此方法返回时，包含运行对象表 (ROT) 的新枚举器。

span.span: When this method returns, contains the new enumerator for the Running Object Table (ROT).

param.span: 此参数未经初始化即被传递。

span.span: This parameter is passed uninitialized.

summary.span: 枚举当前注册为运行对象的对象。

span.span: Enumerates the objects currently registered as running.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关详细信息，请参阅的文档[IRunningObjectTable::EnumRunning](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=163475) MSDN 库中的方法。For more information, see the documentation for the [IRunningObjectTable::EnumRunning](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=163475) method in the MSDN library.

MemberSignature.Value: public int GetObject (System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IMoniker pmkObjectName, out object ppunkObject);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 GetObject(class System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IMoniker pmkObjectName, [out] object& ppunkObject) cil managed
Public Function GetObject (pmkObjectName As IMoniker, ByRef ppunkObject As Object) As Integer
public: int GetObject(System::Runtime::InteropServices::ComTypes::IMoniker ^ pmkObjectName, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::Object ^ % ppunkObject);

param.name: pmkObjectName
param.span: 对要在运行对象表 (ROT) 中搜索的名字对象的引用。

span.span: A reference to the moniker to search for in the Running Object Table (ROT).

param.name: ppunkObject
param.span: 此方法返回时，包含请求的运行对象。

span.span: When this method returns, contains the requested running object.

param.span: 此参数未经初始化即被传递。

span.span: This parameter is passed uninitialized.

summary.span: 如果提供的对象名注册为运行对象，则返回该注册对象。

span.span: Returns the registered object if the supplied object name is registered as running.

returns.span: 一个 值，该值指示操作是成功还是失败。

span.span: An value that indicates the success or failure of the operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关详细信息，请参阅的文档[IRunningObjectTable::GetObject](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=163476) MSDN 库中的方法。For more information, see the documentation for the [IRunningObjectTable::GetObject](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=163476) method in the MSDN library.

MemberSignature.Value: public int GetTimeOfLastChange (System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IMoniker pmkObjectName, out System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FILETIME pfiletime);

Public Function GetTimeOfLastChange (pmkObjectName As IMoniker, ByRef pfiletime As FILETIME) As Integer

public: int GetTimeOfLastChange(System::Runtime::InteropServices::ComTypes::IMoniker ^ pmkObjectName, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::Runtime::InteropServices::ComTypes::FILETIME % pfiletime);

param.name: pmkObjectName
param.span: 对要在运行对象表 (ROT) 中搜索的名字对象的引用。

span.span: A reference to the moniker to search for in the Running Object Table (ROT).

param.name: pfiletime
param.span: 此对象返回时，包含对象的上次更改时间。

span.span: When this object returns, contains the objects last change time.

param.span: 此参数未经初始化即被传递。

span.span: This parameter is passed uninitialized.

summary.span: 在运行对象表 (ROT) 中搜索此名字对象并报告所记录的更改时间（如果存在的话）。

span.span: Searches for this moniker in the Running Object Table (ROT) and reports the recorded time of change, if present.

returns.span: 一个 值，该值指示操作是成功还是失败。

span.span: An value that indicates the success or failure of the operation.

param.name: pmkObjectName
param.span: 对要在运行对象表 (ROT) 中搜索的名字对象的引用。

span.span: A reference to the moniker to search for in the Running Object Table (ROT).

summary.span: 确定指定名字对象当前是否在运行对象表 (ROT) 中注册。

span.span: Determines whether the specified moniker is currently registered in the Running Object Table (ROT).

span.span: An value that indicates the success or failure of the operation.

MemberSignature.Value: public void NoteChangeTime (int dwRegister, ref System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FILETIME pfiletime);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void NoteChangeTime(int32 dwRegister, valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FILETIME& pfiletime) cil managed
Public Sub NoteChangeTime (dwRegister As Integer, ByRef pfiletime As FILETIME)
public: void NoteChangeTime(int dwRegister, System::Runtime::InteropServices::ComTypes::FILETIME % pfiletime);

param.name: dwRegister
param.span: 已更改对象的运行对象表 (ROT) 项。

span.span: The Running Object Table (ROT) entry of the changed object.

param.name: pfiletime
param.span: 对对象的上次更改时间的引用。

span.span: A reference to the object's last change time.

summary.span: 记录特定对象发生更改的时间，以便 可以报告相应更改时间。

span.span: Notes the time that a particular object changed so can report an appropriate change time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关详细信息，请参阅的文档[IRunningObjectTable::NoteChangeTime](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=163479) MSDN 库中的方法。For more information, see the documentation for the [IRunningObjectTable::NoteChangeTime](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=163479) method in the MSDN library.

MemberSignature.Value: public int Register (int grfFlags, object punkObject, System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IMoniker pmkObjectName);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 Register(int32 grfFlags, object punkObject, class System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IMoniker pmkObjectName) cil managed
Public Function Register (grfFlags As Integer, punkObject As Object, pmkObjectName As IMoniker) As Integer
public: int Register(int grfFlags, System::Object ^ punkObject, System::Runtime::InteropServices::ComTypes::IMoniker ^ pmkObjectName);

param.name: grfFlags
param.span: 指定运行对象表 (ROT) 对 punkObject 的引用是弱引用还是强引用，并通过对象在 ROT 中的项控制对它的访问。

span.span: Specifies whether the Running Object Table's (ROT) reference to punkObject is weak or strong, and controls access to the object through its entry in the ROT.

param.name: punkObject
param.span: 对注册为运行对象的对象的引用。

span.span: A reference to the object being registered as running.

param.name: pmkObjectName
param.span: 对标识 punkObject 的名字对象的引用。

span.span: A reference to the moniker that identifies punkObject.

summary.span: 注册提供的对象已进入运行状态。

span.span: Registers that the supplied object has entered the running state.

returns.span: 一个值，该值可用于在随后对 或 的调用中标识此 ROT 项。

span.span: A value that can be used to identify this ROT entry in subsequent calls to or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对 ROT 引用`punkObject`（弱和强） 确定对象的生存期。ROT references to `punkObject` (weak and strong) determine object lifetime. 有关详细信息，请参阅 COM 的文档[IRunningObjectTable::Register](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=163474) MSDN 库中的方法。For more information, see the documentation for the COM [IRunningObjectTable::Register](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=163474) method in the MSDN library.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Revoke (int dwRegister);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Revoke(int32 dwRegister) cil managed
Public Sub Revoke (dwRegister As Integer)
public: void Revoke(int dwRegister);

param.name: dwRegister
param.span: 要撤消的运行对象表 (ROT) 项。

span.span: The Running Object Table (ROT) entry to revoke.

summary.span: 从运行对象表 (ROT) 中注销指定的对象。

span.span: Unregisters the specified object from the Running Object Table (ROT).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关详细信息，请参阅的文档[IRunningObjectTable::Revoke](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=163480) MSDN 库中的方法。For more information, see the documentation for the [IRunningObjectTable::Revoke](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=163480) method in the MSDN library.
